entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 03:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning then to rain at times heavy near noon. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
